instruction: Devise a scenario where two machines can cooperate autonomously with each other.
output: A scenario where two machines can cooperate autonomously is a robotic assistant system. The two machines can be programmed to take on tasks and interact with each other in order to complete those tasks. For example, one machine can be programmed to perform tasks such as finding items, running errands and delivering items. The other machine can be programmed with delivery instructions and route optimization software. The two machines can then operate simultaneously, interacting with each other to ensure the items are delivered in a timely manner. In this way, the machines can cooperate autonomously to complete tasks.
